summary: Completed frontend-only testing of VirtualHEMS PWA upgrade - Downloads page, EFB view, PWA configuration, and authentication flows all working correctly

design_issues.issue: Downloads link not visible in main homepage navigation - users need to navigate directly to /downloads

passed_tests: Downloads page loads correctly at /downloads with all plugin sections
X-Plane plugin download link works and file is accessible (HTTP 200)
MSFS plugin download link works and file is accessible (HTTP 200)
iPad EFB section displays with functional 'Open EFB View' button
manifest.json properly configured for PWA with all required properties
Login page loads correctly with all form elements
EFB route at /efb correctly requires authentication and redirects to login
Sidebar contains iPad EFB View link in Regional Assets section
PWA installation instructions present for both iPad/iPhone and Desktop
EFB button navigation works correctly (redirects to login when not authenticated)
Tabbed interface works for switching between X-Plane and MSFS plugins
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding Downloads link to main homepage navigation for better discoverability. All core PWA features are working correctly.
